Name: Project Share Food Bank
Description:
Project SHARE distributes food boxes in the week of the 3rd Thursday of 
each month. Each food box contains 55-65 nutritious food items, 
approximately one week's groceries for a family of four.  Project SHARE 
uses a client choice model empowering our recipients to choose the 
groceries they need. This model strengthens self-worth and value among 
our clients who often feel powerless.
